biotools.summary: Cheminformatics Tool for Probabilistic Identification of Carbohydrates (CTPIC) is a tool that analyzes the covalent structure of a compound to yield a probabilistic measure for distinguishing saccharides and saccharide-derivatives from non-saccharides.

bioschemas.name: CTPIC
bioschemas.summary: Cheminformatics Tool for Probabilistic Identification of Carbohydrates (CTPIC) is a tool that analyzes the covalent structure of a compound to yield a probabilistic measure for distinguishing saccharides and saccharide-derivatives from non-saccharides.
